api.entity

Interface GameObject

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDInterface
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Entity, Item
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGameObject, AbstractItem, Activatable, Book, Button, Chest, Door, Floor, Key, Library, Pane, Player, PressurePlate, Room, Switch

    public interface GameObject
extends IDInterface
    Un object du jeu
    Since:
    4.0 23/12/2019
    Version:
    4.0 23/12/2019
    Author:
    Jorys-Micke ALAÏS, Louka DOZ, Loic SENECAT, Quentin RAMSAMY-AGEORGES
    See Also:
    Entity, Room

      Renvoi la hauteur de l'entité (en cases de 16x16)
